name: Elite Wireless Headphones
description: Premium noise-canceling headphones with 40-hour battery life and studio-grade sound quality. Ideal for travel and work.

name: Minimalist Smart Watch
description: Sleek, water-resistant smartwatch with health tracking, heart rate monitor, and seamless smartphone integration.

name: Vintage Cotton Oxford Shirt
description: Classic tailored fit shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Breathable and perfect for any casual or formal occasion.

name: Ceramic Matte Vase
description: Handcrafted minimalist ceramic vase with a matte finish. A perfect centerpiece for modern home interiors.

name: Portable Mechanical Keyboard
description: Compact 65% mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting and hot-swappable switches for the ultimate typing experience.

name: Leather Travel Weekender
description: Spacious genuine leather travel bag with reinforced handles and a detachable shoulder strap. Timeless design for frequent travelers.

name: Smart Ambient Light Strip
description: Customizable LED light strip with 16 million colors and voice control compatibility. Perfect for gaming setups or movies.

name: Modern Ergo Office Chair
description: High-back ergonomic office chair with breathable mesh and adjustable lumbar support. Designed for long working hours.

name: All-Weather Polarized Sunglasses
description: UV400 protection polarized sunglasses with a lightweight titanium frame. Durable and stylish for outdoor adventures.

name: Bamboo Fiber Bath Towel Set
description: Ultra-soft and absorbent towels made from sustainable bamboo fiber. Hypoallergenic and quick-drying.

name: Professional DSLR Camera Bag
description: Weatherproof camera backpack with customizable padded dividers and a tripod holder. Safe and secure for all your gear.

name: Wool Blend Oversized Coat
description: Elegant wool blend coat with a relaxed fit. Keeps you warm and stylish during the winter months.
